content: MUMBAI  March 10 Indian drugmaker Dr.Reddy's Laboratories Ltd is in talks to acquire the Indian operations of Belgian pharmaceutical company UCB SA for about $135 million  said a person with direct knowledge of the matter.

title: Dr.Reddy's in talks to buy UCB India business for $135 mln - source
